name: ListEmployees
description: Provides summary information for all of a business's employees.

order.description: The order in which employees are listed in the response, based on their created_at field.      Default value: ASC

begin_updated_at.description: If filtering results by their updated_at field, the beginning of the requested reporting period, in ISO 8601 format

end_updated_at.description: If filtering results by there updated_at field, the end of the requested reporting period, in ISO 8601 format.

begin_created_at.description: If filtering results by their created_at field, the beginning of the requested reporting period, in ISO 8601 format.

end_created_at.description: If filtering results by their created_at field, the end of the requested reporting period, in ISO 8601 format.

status.description: If provided, the endpoint returns only employee entities with the specified status (ACTIVE or INACTIVE).

external_id.description: If provided, the endpoint returns only employee entities with the specified external_id.

limit.description: The maximum integer number of employee entities to return in a single response. Default 100, maximum 200.

batch_token.description:
A pagination cursor to retrieve the next set of results for your
original query to the endpoint.

$block: Represents one of a business's employees.

$ul: **authorized_location_ids**: The IDs of the locations the employee is allowed to clock in at.
**created_at**: The time when the employee entity was created, in ISO 8601 format.
**external_id**: An ID the merchant can set to associate the employee with an entity in another system.
**role_ids**: The ids of the employee's associated roles. Currently, you can specify only one or zero roles per employee.
**status**: Whether the employee is ACTIVE or INACTIVE. Inactive employees cannot sign in to Square Register.Merchants update this field from the Square Dashboard.
**updated_at**: The time when the employee entity was most recently updated, in ISO 8601 format.
